summary: Triaged 3 workflow engine gaps: missing retry logic, no cancel_workflow() method, and no prompt_template variable substitution
key_findings: WorkflowEngine.complete_step() in nexus/core/workflow.py immediately sets StepStatus.FAILED with no retry logic, despite retry: Optional[int] field existing in WorkflowStep model (models.py:105)
WorkflowState.CANCELLED is defined in models.py:17 and included in is_terminal() but no cancel_workflow() method exists anywhere in the codebase
prompt_template is parsed from YAML (workflow.py:479) and stored (file.py:235,266) but never interpolated â€” {description} and other placeholders are passed raw to agents
